#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define uint unsigned int
using namespace std;
bool palindrome(uint num)
{
    uint temp,revnum=0,rem;
    temp=num;
    while(temp!=0)
    {
        rem=temp%10;
        revnum=revnum*10+rem;
        temp/=10;
    }
    if(num==revnum)
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}
int main()
{
    uint test,num,i;
    scanf("%u",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%u",&num);
        for(i=num+1;i<1000000;i++)
        {
            if(palindrome(i))
                break;
        }
        printf("%u\n",i);
    }
    return 0;
}
